panels.description: Distribution of GitHub Copilot usage by editor/IDE with percentages

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  JSON_EXTRACT(editor_breakdown, CONCAT('$[', idx, '].editor')) AS editor,
  SUM(CAST(JSON_EXTRACT(editor_breakdown, CONCAT('$[', idx, '].active_users')) AS UNSIGNED)) AS users
FROM _tool_github_copilot_usage
CROSS JOIN (
  SELECT 0 AS idx UNION ALL SELECT 1 UNION ALL SELECT 2 UNION ALL 
  SELECT 3 UNION ALL SELECT 4 UNION ALL SELECT 5
) numbers
WHERE 
  $__timeFilter(day)
  AND JSON_EXTRACT(editor_breakdown, CONCAT('$[', idx, '].editor')) IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY editor
ORDER BY users DESC

panels.title: Editor Distribution (with %)

panels.description: Detailed breakdown of editor usage with count and percentage

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  editor_name AS 'Editor',
  total_users AS 'Users',
  CONCAT(total_users, ' (', ROUND(total_users * 100.0 / total, 2), '%)') AS 'Count (%)'
FROM (
  SELECT 
    REPLACE(JSON_EXTRACT(editor_breakdown, CONCAT('$[', idx, '].editor')), '"', '') AS editor_name,
    SUM(CAST(JSON_EXTRACT(editor_breakdown, CONCAT('$[', idx, '].active_users')) AS UNSIGNED)) AS total_users,
    (
      SELECT SUM(CAST(JSON_EXTRACT(e.editor_breakdown, CONCAT('$[', n.idx, '].active_users')) AS UNSIGNED))
      FROM _tool_github_copilot_usage e
      CROSS JOIN (
        SELECT 0 AS idx UNION ALL SELECT 1 UNION ALL SELECT 2 UNION ALL 
        SELECT 3 UNION ALL SELECT 4 UNION ALL SELECT 5
      ) n
      WHERE $__timeFilter(e.day)
        AND JSON_EXTRACT(e.editor_breakdown, CONCAT('$[', n.idx, '].editor')) IS NOT NULL
    ) AS total
  FROM _tool_github_copilot_usage
  CROSS JOIN (
    SELECT 0 AS idx UNION ALL SELECT 1 UNION ALL SELECT 2 UNION ALL 
    SELECT 3 UNION ALL SELECT 4 UNION ALL SELECT 5
  ) numbers
  WHERE 
    $__timeFilter(day)
    AND JSON_EXTRACT(editor_breakdown, CONCAT('$[', idx, '].editor')) IS NOT NULL
  GROUP BY editor_name
) sub
ORDER BY total_users DESC

panels.title: Editor Distribution Table

panels.description: Distribution of GitHub Copilot usage by programming language

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  REPLACE(JSON_EXTRACT(language_breakdown, CONCAT('$[', idx, '].language')), '"', '') AS language,
  SUM(CAST(JSON_EXTRACT(language_breakdown, CONCAT('$[', idx, '].acceptances_count')) AS UNSIGNED)) AS acceptances
FROM _tool_github_copilot_usage
CROSS JOIN (
  SELECT 0 AS idx UNION ALL SELECT 1 UNION ALL SELECT 2 UNION ALL 
  SELECT 3 UNION ALL SELECT 4 UNION ALL SELECT 5 UNION ALL 
  SELECT 6 UNION ALL SELECT 7 UNION ALL SELECT 8 UNION ALL SELECT 9
) numbers
WHERE 
  $__timeFilter(day)
  AND JSON_EXTRACT(language_breakdown, CONCAT('$[', idx, '].language')) IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY language
ORDER BY acceptances DESC
LIMIT 10

panels.title: Language Distribution (Top 10)
